Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can depict two students with cups in their hands connected by a string, indicating a basic understanding of a string telephone.
The student can show the string is pulled tight between the two cups, demonstrating an understanding that tension in the string is necessary.
The student can illustrate or label how sound travels through the string to solve the problem of communication, possibly with lines or arrows representing sound waves.
The student can show and correctly label the materials used, such as cups and string, using only the provided materials.
CANNOT: The student might inconsistently apply or label how sound travels, potentially missing directional indicators or using unclear symbols *(sound waves not consistently or correctly drawn)*.
The student may not fully highlight why the string must be tight with explicit labels or notes, although it is shown correctly in the drawing *(concept present but not verbally annotated)*.
